HOME.SLOGAN: You need some help with your subject or just want to check your calculations? You are at the best place!
HOME.WIP_NOTE: Please keep in mind that this part of the app is still in progress.
HOME.SUGGESTION: Try solving the following problems with the help of the app:

TRANSPORTATION_PR.TITLE: Transportation problem
TRANSPORTATION_PR.ALL: Need both first and second phase steps?
TRANSPORTATION_PR.EPSILON: If only the epsilon is needed
TRANSPORTATION_PR.SECOND_PHASE: If only the second phase is needed

FEATURE_LIST.LANGUAGES: You can choose between English & Hungarian
FEATURE_LIST.THEMES: You can set your preferred theme

SUPPORT.TITLE: Support
SUPPORT.CONTENT: If you would like to support my work you can do it via

API_DOCS.INFO: Under construction! It will be available soon.

ALL.NAME: All
ALL.INVALID_TP_DATA: The given problem is not solvable! Try another one.
ALL.TABLE_EXPLANATION: The table in the top left corner represents the costs, next to it on the right it's the stocks of storages and under them can be found the demands of the shops.

EPSILON.NAME: Epsilon only
EPSILON.REVIEW_INFO: Based on the given data the following table will be calculated. Make sure it is filled correctly.

ERRORS.NULL_COST: All cost cells must be filled.
ERRORS.NO_TRANSPORT: There must be at least one transportation.

SIDE_TABLES.TITLE: Side tables (below and right side)
SIDE_TABLES.DESCRIPTION: These contain auxiliary variables that show which cells are worth taking into the base.

ORANGE_BADGES.TITLE: Orange badges (number, plus sign)
ORANGE_BADGES.DESCRIPTION: Reduced cost values. Positive values are shown by a plus sign.

ORANGE_NUMBERS_LEFT.TITLE: Orange numbers (top left corner)
ORANGE_NUMBERS_LEFT.DESCRIPTION: Marks those cells that are part of the circle and marked by order.

ORANGE_BORDERED_CELL.TITLE: Orange bordered cell
ORANGE_BORDERED_CELL.DESCRIPTION: The cell that is going into the base next.
